tool_description:
Get a list of cities that match a search criteria. Results in JSON and include city, state and country. Search criteria is also applied to states and countries.

Optionally, provide a "searchby" parameter that can be one of "city", "state" or "country" to narrow the results.
name: World Cities
title: World Cities

api_list.name: Query
api_list.description: Use a query with at least 3 characters to search for a city, state or country matching the query

optional_parameters.name: searchby
optional_parameters.description: Optionally search by city, state or country to narrow the results.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: It can be part of the name of a city, state or country. At least 3 characters are needed.
